name: Little Orbit
description:
My entry to Ludum Dare 47, Compo category

All the code and content in the game were made by me within the 48h period.

Xbox controller support is available in this build.

------------------------------------------

Protect the planet. You might be stuck in an inconvenient loop, but you can still do it!

Hit colored enemies with the opposite color for extra damage and star points

Collect 10 star points to heal your planet, helping you survive longer.
